Package pymobu

source code

PyMoBu

An enhancement for Autodesk's MotionBuilder Python implementation. PyMoBu offers stronger and more user-friendly object classes and functions that wrap around existing MotionBuilder objects.

It is easy to convert your existing object to a PyMoBu one by calling the 'ConvertToPyMoBu' method on that object.

Google code project page: http://code.google.com/p/pymobu/

Supported MB versions: 2010

Version: 0.1

Author: Scott Englert - scott@scottenglert.com

Submodules [hide private]
  • pymobu.components: Component module
    • pymobu.components.constraints: Constraint Module
  • pymobu.core: Module for more general functions
  • pymobu.datatypes: Matrix and vector module for PyMoBu - will work as stand alone library Modified code from PyEuclid module - http://code.google.com/p/pyeuclid/ See license in source code.
